org.jhove2.core.io
Class AbstractInput

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.io.AbstractInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
Input
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectInput, MappedInput, NonDirectInput
public abstract class AbstractInput
extends Object
implements Input

Abstract JHOVE2 inputter.

Author:
mstrong, slabrams

getBuffer

public ByteBuffer getBuffer()
Get the ByteBuffer underlying the Input. If the buffer position is locally manipulated, the resetBuffer() method must be invoked prior to reading the Input.

Specified by:

Returns:

getBufferOffset

public long getBufferOffset()
Get current buffer offset from the beginning of the inputable, in bytes. This offset is the beginning of the buffer. Buffer Offset = channel position - buffer size Note: the channel position is the location in the inputable where data will next be read from or written to.

Specified by:
getBufferOffset in interface Input
Returns:
Current buffer offset, in bytes
See Also:
Input.getBufferOffset()

resetBuffer

public void resetBuffer()
Reset the buffer position. This method is only necessary after a buffer has been retrieved via getBuffer() and the position of that local copy has been manipulated.

Specified by:
resetBuffer in interface Input
See Also:
